description: This state of the art pickup truck includes rear-view cameras for backing up and  pulling in, an 8 - inch capacitive touchscreen, and a built in towing package. This truck is wonderful for off-roading adventures and great  for towing with a powerful 6 cylinder engine and enough torque to carry motorhomes or small trailers.

This heavy duty truck has everything an explorer or everyday person needs in a vehicle.  Some special features of the vehicle include heated mirrors, a 8-cylinder engine that pumps out around 355 horsepower, and finally all leather seats.  This truck isn't just good for work and off-roading, it's also good for families or road trips because of the three seat cab that is perfect for young kids or teenagers.

The Jeep Wrangler is one of the highest rated SUVs according to Kelly Blue Book.  The Wrangler is a nice medium sized SUV with a three row backseat for hauling kids around or carpooling with your friends.  Some of the highlights of the car include: a 4WD drive train, an automatic transmission, and removable doors.  This car was especially designed to go off road on dunes or trails with its heavy duty suspension and tires.

This top class sedan has a top speed of 155 Miles per hour and an impressive time of 3.6 seconds to go 0-60 MPH.  Aside from the speed and power of this car, the RS5 includes:  automatic transmission, Audi Sport Suspension, and Audi Sport Rear Differential.  The RS5 also has  great fuel economy because the car can travel 18 miles per gallon in the city and on the highway the RS5 can travel 25 miles per gallon.
features: Audi Sport Suspension, Audi Sport Rear Differential

description: The Audi RS5 Sportback Coupe is a modified version of the regular sportback the main difference is that the coupe is a little bigger and is less sporty than the sportback.  The key features of the Coupe include: Audi Sport Adaptive Damping Suspension, Quattro Sport Differential, and power steering.  This car is both classy and sporty and is the perfect mix of party and business.
features: Audi Sport Adaptive Damping Suspension, quattro Sport Differential

description: This one of a kind sports car has a top speed of 155 miles per hour and the M4 has a 6-cylinder engine that produces 503 horsepower. The car looks good on both the inside and the outside for example it has a competition trim and a sporty exterior.  On the inside the M4 has all leather seats, a heated steering wheel, and an interactive touch screen.  This car is great for going fast with its M Carbon Ceramic Brakes and Adaptive M Suspension.
features: M Carbon Ceramic Brakes, Adaptive M Suspension

description: The Santa Fe is a medium-small sized SUV perfect for couples or small families.  The car is beautiful on the outside with an SE trim and great wheels and brakes.  This car is just as beautiful on the inside as it is on the outside.  The Santa Fe has all leather seats with a beautiful back row.  The car also is equipped with Blind spot monitoring, a rearview camera, and an 8 inch adaptive touchscreen.  This car’s speakers will blow your friends away especially while blasting music on your late night drives.

This all-around great SUV is meant for families or explorers and adventurers.  The Outback is stacked with inside features including a touch screen, leather seats, and a state of the art heating and cooling unit.  The car also has some amazing features on the outside including AWD and adaptive headlights.  Lastly the Outback has an automatic transmission and adaptive cruise control for when you want to just sit back and relax.

This one of a kind SUV is for the go-getters in life and people who  love to chase their dreams.  With this car you can use it for business or casual depending on the occasion.  The key interior features that this car has to offer are its blind spot monitoring and heated seats along with a heated steering wheel.  This vehicle also has an amazing FWD system and the fuel economy is out of this world.

The 2022 BMW Z4 M40i is a premium roadster that offers a perfect blend of style, performance, and luxury. With its stunning blue exterior, this car is sure to turn heads and make a statement wherever it goes. Under the hood, the M40i boasts a turbocharged 3.0-liter inline-six engine that delivers impressive power and acceleration. The interior of this BMW is as stylish as its exterior, with premium materials, advanced technologies, and comfortable seating. From the driver-focused cockpit to the latest connectivity features, the Z4 M40i is designed to deliver a truly memorable driving experience. Whether you're cruising down the coast or hitting the open road, this BMW roadster is the perfect companion for your next adventure.
features: M Sport brakes, M Sport suspension

description: This 2022 Ford Mustang GT is a sleek and powerful sports car that is sure to turn heads. With a black exterior, it exudes a bold and confident presence on the road. The GT model boasts a powerful 5.0-liter V8 engine that delivers adrenaline-fueled performance. This Mustang is equipped with advanced technologies and features, including a responsive touch screen display, premium sound system, and advanced safety features to ensure a smooth and secure driving experience. Whether you're cruising down the highway or taking a thrilling drive through the mountains, this Ford Mustang GT is the ultimate driving machine.

The black Porsche Boxster GTS is a top-of-the-line roadster that delivers a thrilling driving experience. With its sleek and sporty design, this Porsche is sure to turn heads and make a statement on the road. Under the hood, the GTS boasts a powerful 2.5-liter flat-six engine that provides brisk acceleration and dynamic handling. The interior is just as impressive, with premium materials, advanced technologies, and comfortable seating. Whether you're carving through twisty roads or cruising on the highway, the Porsche Boxster GTS is designed to provide an unforgettable driving experience. With its combination of style, performance, and luxury, this black Porsche is the ultimate roadster for those who demand the best.
features: Sport Chrono Package, Porsche Active Suspension Management

description: The blue Jaguar I-PACE S is an electric luxury SUV that combines cutting-edge technology with a stunning design. With its striking blue exterior, this Jaguar makes a bold statement on the road. The I-PACE S is powered by two electric motors that deliver instant torque and responsive handling. The interior is just as impressive, with premium materials, advanced technologies, and spacious seating. From the high-definition touchscreen to the advanced safety features, the I-PACE S is designed to provide a comfortable and connected driving experience. With its impressive range, the I-PACE S is perfect for both city and highway driving. Whether you're looking for a sustainable and stylish mode of transportation, the blue Jaguar I-PACE S is the ultimate electric luxury SUV

The red Tesla Model S Long Range is a fully electric luxury sedan that delivers cutting-edge performance and technology. With its bold red exterior, this Model S is sure to turn heads and make a statement on the road. The Long Range model boasts a powerful electric motor that provides smooth, instant acceleration and a driving range of over 400 miles on a single charge. The interior is just as impressive, with a minimalist design, premium materials, and a large touchscreen display that controls most of the car's functions. From the advanced autopilot system to the cutting-edge safety features, the Tesla Model S Long Range is designed to provide a truly unique and memorable driving experience. Whether you're commuting to work or embarking on a road trip, the red Tesla Model S Long Range is the ultimate electric luxury sedan

The nissan leaf was made for the doers in life that need to get things accomplished.  This car was specially designed for saving the environment while still doing the jobs that a car needs to do. The most notable features from this car include: autopilot, bluetooth navigation, and a small movie screen that can be lowered down for the kids or teens. On the outside some highlights of the car are the automatic transmission and the amazing FWD.

This car is a small sized SUV perfect for singles or couples that are eager to take trips or just need the car to get from point “a” to point “b”. The key features of this amazing car include: a state of the art navigation system, heated front seats, amazing surround sound audio, and great RWD. Just like many other cars on the website the i3 rex is also electric meaning that this car is going to be quieter and sometimes faster than normal cars.

This small sized SUV is almost a crossover between a classy sudan and a sport SUV. The most notable features on the Bolt are automatic emergency braking system, regen on demand, and a heated steering wheel. The best thing about this car overall surpasses all those things. The most beneficial part of this car is that it runs on electricity meaning that you save money on gas and you’re doing your part to save and protect the environment from pollution.
features: Regen On Demand, Automatic Emergency Braking

description: This premium new breed of electric car has some of the best performance on the market today. The car has amazing features inside and outside for example on the inside the car includes: a six inch touch screen display, heated seats, and a heated steering wheel. On the outside and under the hood the car gets even better with it’s AWD system, amazing gas mileage and power steering.
features: Audi Virtual Cockpit, Quattro All-Wheel Drive
